Activity: Meeting with @trainer-1 and @ehrdev-1 to discuss data quality improvement training. Get buy-in on setting weekly targets for improvement.
Follow up with the stakeholder to communicate the importance of the data quality and the goals.
Create a dashboard to track progress against the weekly targets. The dashboard should display the current performance of each data quality metric and highlight areas that need attention.
Test and refine the data quality dashboard. Ensure it is accurate, user-friendly, and provides actionable insights.
Share the dashboard with stakeholders and provide training on how to use it to monitor data quality performance.
Review the week's accomplishments and identify any outstanding tasks. Plan for the following week.
Final email check and wrap up. Prepare for the weekend!
